extracted_entities.name: 12th International Conference on Software Defined Systems (SDS2025)

topics: Software-Defined Cloud, Edge, and Fog Environments
Security, Privacy, and Trust in Software-Defined Systems

submission_guidelines.content_format: 10-point font using the IEEE 8.5" x 11" two-column format
submission_guidelines.review_process: All submissions are peer-reviewed by at least two reviewers.
submission_guidelines.accepted_papers: Accepted papers will appear in the SDS 2025 Proceedings and submitted to IEEE Xplore.
